title: HoosHeard
description: Welcome to HoosHeard, an anonymous social media platform designed to help your voice be heard! Every day, you are presented with a thought-provoking question to answer, but you must submit your response before you can see all other anonymous responses. Join HoosHeard to share, connect, and be heard!

title: UVAStudySpaces
description: Discover a catalog of study spaces at the University of Virginia, curated by students for students! Explore, search, and view unique features of various study spots across UVA's grounds. Powered by the Google Maps API.

title: Machine Learning for Virginia
description: This project explores SOL (Standards of Learning) pass rates in Virginia using machine learning techniques such as Random Forest Regression and K-means Clustering. In a final report, it compares the insights gathered from each technique.

title: Lorem Squarepants
description: A Lorem Ipsum generator full of quotes from the SpongeBob SquarePants show!

title: Credit Score Simulator
description: Awarded 1st place in finance track of the 2023 HooHacks Hackathon by building a gamified credit score simulator with 3 friends in under 24 hours.

title: FlickVault
description: A personal movie backlog and history written with PHP. Awarded "Most Usable" design in Programming Languages for Web Applications at UVA.

title: This Portfolio!
description: Designed in Figma and styled solely with css.
